devdoc.details: Mods can be used to distribute a percentage of payments or tickets to preconfigured beneficiaries.

params._terminalDirectory: A directory of a project's current Juicebox terminal to receive payments in.

params._fundingCycleId: The ID of the fundingCycle to get mods for.

returns._0: An array of all mods for the project.

setPayoutMods(uint256,uint256,(uint16,ad.details: Only the owner or operator of a project can make this call, or the current terminal of the project.

params._projectId: The project to add a mod to.

payoutModsOf(uint256).notice: Get all payout mods for the specified project ID.

setPayoutMods(uint256,uint256,(uint16,ad.notice: Adds a mod to the payout mods list.

userdoc.notice: Stores mods for each project.the fundingCycleID is unique, then there is no need to store ProjectId in SmartContract.
